examples.description: returns an array of all items belonging to a user
examples.full_description: Items GET /users/:user_id/items returns an array of all items belonging to a user

examples.description: returns a 404 response if the user is not found
examples.full_description: Items GET /users/:user_id/items returns a 404 response if the user is not found

examples.description: returns the item with the matching id
examples.full_description: Items GET /users/:user_id/items/:id returns the item with the matching id

examples.description: returns a 404 response if the item is not found
examples.full_description: Items GET /users/:user_id/items/:id returns a 404 response if the item is not found

examples.description: creates a new item belonging to a user
examples.full_description: Items POST /users/:user_id/items creates a new item belonging to a user
